subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Williams overcame illness and shakiness to beat Lucie Safarova for her fifth three-set win in Paris, more than she had in any of her previous 19 runs to a Grand Slam singles title.
snippet: Williams overcame illness and shakiness to beat Lucie Safarova for her fifth three-set win in Paris, more than she had in any of her previous 19 runs to a Grand Slam singles title.
